app.name: Wii mini SD Patcher
app.short_description: Return SD Card support to your Wii mini!
app.long_description:
Based on Aurelio's RVLoader Installer, Wii mini SD Patcher allows you to return SD functionality to your Wii mini console by patching the need for a WiFi adapter out of the Wii IOS, making it safe to install on a Wii mini. To use, please place the following wads in the root of your USB drive: - IOS36-64-3608.wad - IOS58-64-6176.wad - IOS80-64-6944.wad You can obtain these files from NUS.
For more information, please visit the project's GitHub page at https://github.com/Wii-Mini-Hacking/wiini-sd-patcher
